div.bibl: Morgan, Rev. Vyrnwy, The Cambro-American Pulpit. Funk and Wagnalls Company, New York and London, 1899. [WELSH CHARACTERISTICS]

body.p: P. 56- The Welsh “dislike theatres, sports and races…They are impulsive…and have a tendency to be obstinate and are far more gifted with the perception of differences between themselves and others, than with the recognition of similarities and agreements; envious and vindictive; more religious than moral.”
